ABOUT.TITLE: About ME

Proven ability to solve complex problems, communicate effectively, conduct independent research, and collaborate in team environments. Skilled in leveraging cutting-edge technologies to deliver high-quality software solutions.

Integrated capture and management of notifications sent by AWS, enhancing user communication and responsiveness.
Created components and functionalities for file upload and download to AWS S3.
Assisted in bug fixing and library version migrations.
Promoted and shared development best practices and standards.
Collaborated on the design of new build-outs.
